CustomField.description: The metric on a 0-100 scale that sets a constant goal of Zero Energy and is normalized by climate and building type. See NBI website for more information. SF-30463
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The metric on a 0-100 scale that sets a constant goal of Zero Energy and is normalized by climate and building type. See NBI website for more information.
CustomField.label: zEPI score
